info.title: Magadan API
info.description: This is documentation of Magadan API

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Field name for sorting in DB.

get.summary: Gets permissions for the current user

post.summary: Allows user to reset their password using single-use password reset token issued by the backend.

requestBody.description: The dto contains old and new passwords.

post.summary:
Resets tenant to a default state.
Resetting in practice is usually faster then creating new tenant
(in cases when creating  a tenant involves seeding the data).
            
Also resetting allows to reuse the browser session in UI Tests without re-login in every test.
Creates a test tenant to be used in UI Tests

get.summary: If Signer is used in signing, returns the list of project names that will be invalidated.

post.summary:
Responds to requests generated by subscriptions registered with the SharePoint WebHook REST API.
Documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/dev/apis/webhooks/webhooks-reference-implementation.
If a validation token is present, we need to respond within 5 seconds by
returning the given validation token. This only happens when a new web hook is being added.

parameters.name: validationToken
parameters.description: Token to validate current endpoint for webhhok creating.

post.summary:
Tries to lock document with provided sessionId or prolong existing lock.
If document is already locked with another sessionId, throws ValidationException.

Tries to lock document with provided sessionId.
If document is already locked with another sessionId, unlocks document and locks it again with new sessionId.

delete.summary:
Tries to unlock document with provided sessionId.
If document is already locked with another sessionId, throws ValidationException.

post.summary: Sends document to preparation for export. Preparation merges splitted tables
Try this in browser with language set to DE

get.summary: Gets the version of the service.

errors.description: Gets or sets the validation errors associated with this instance of ValidationProblemDetails.

basedOnDocumentId.description:
Used only for System document variables to store version and name.
Refers to initial document id.

documentId.description:
Used only for local variables.
Refers to document at which level it is accessible.

isTracked.description:
Indicates if variable is tracked. Used for variable with table value.
Fetches updates from document, where it was inserted.

basedOnDocumentId.description:
Used only for System document variables to store version and name.
Refers to initial document id.

documentId.description:
Used only for local variables.
Refers to document at which level it is accessible.

documentsIds.description: Ids of documents containing current variable.

hasUpdatedData.description:
Indicates if variable has type Auto
and data by its url has differ with its Value

updatedDataDetectedDate.description: Date of detecting updated data at external service.

ResponseDataOfNotificationData.description: Data of response json with multiple objects.

NotificationData.description: Web hook notification data: this message is received when SharePoint "fires" a web hook.

sharePointUrl.description: Provides actual SharePoint url for documents exporting.

isExported.description:
True if current version of document is exported to SharePoint.
False if document is not exported or was changed after exporting.

isNeedToBeReopened.description: Indicates if document should be reopened after update

isDeletable.description: Required to inform user, that role can not be deleted.

merged_cells.description:
Optional. Contains merged cells information.
Format: {rowIndex: {startCellIndex: endCellIndex}}

cells_properties.description: Optional. Contains predefined table cells properties.

TableDataCellStyle.description:
Properties that will be applied to the table after insertion to the document.
To apply them well, JSON properties names must be same as TableCell properties names.
https://docs.devexpress.com/AspNetCore/js-DevExpress.RichEdit.TableCell

JWT Token.description: Copy 'Bearer ' + valid JWT token into field
JWT Token.name: Authorization
